Add metadata to a dataset

rio_add_dataset_metadata.Rd

This function adds metadata to a dataset in the RIO structure.

Usage

rio_add_dataset_metadata(
  datasets,
  dataset_name,
  category = NULL,
  subcategory = NULL,
  dimension = NULL,
  description = NULL,
  extra_metadata = NULL
)

Arguments

datasets

The RIO datasets structure as returned by rio_load_datasets().

dataset_name

Name of the dataset.

category

Main category of the dataset (e.g., "Educational Structure Reality").

subcategory

Subcategory of the dataset (e.g., "Who What Where How").

dimension

Dimension of the dataset (e.g., "Primary Education").

description

Description of the dataset. If NULL, the existing description is kept.

extra_metadata

List with any additional metadata.

Value

The updated RIO datasets structure.
